argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` S ) = ( Scalar ` S ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` T ) = ( Scalar ` T ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_lmhmlem | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) /\ ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ ( Scalar ` T ) = ( Scalar ` S ) ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) /\ ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ ( Scalar ` T ) = ( Scalar ` S ) ) ) -> F e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> F e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) |
